action.name: Multiattack
entries: The xorn makes three claw attacks and one bite attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage.
